name: Turkish Salep
description: An easy make-at-home version of the silky-smooth, perfumed Turkish beverage.
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons finely chopped pistachios, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: In a small saucepan, combine rice flour and milk, whisking well. Set saucepan over medium heat and bring to a simmer, whisking constantly. When mixture has thickened, about 2 minutes longer, add sugar and rosewater and stir. Divide salep between two mugs and garnish with cinnamon and chopped pistachios.
